gene.function: FUNCTION: Rab effector protein acting as linker between gamma-adaptin, RAB4A or RAB5A. Involved in endocytic membrane fusion and membrane trafficking of recycling endosomes. Stimulates nucleotide exchange on RAB5A. Can act as a ubiquitin ligase (By similarity). {ECO:0000250, ECO:0000269|PubMed:11452015, ECO:0000269|PubMed:15339665, ECO:0000269|PubMed:9323142}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Cytoplasm {ECO:0000269|PubMed:12505986}. Early endosome {ECO:0000269|PubMed:12505986}. Recycling endosome {ECO:0000269|PubMed:12505986}.
